meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics that are beyond typical masculinity.
meanings.sent1: The superhero's supervirile strength allowed him to lift cars effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: He admired the supervirile physique of the bodybuilder at the gym.
meanings.sent3: The supervirile lumberjack effortlessly chopped down trees with a single swing.
meanings.sent4: His supervirile presence in the room made everyone turn their heads.
meanings.sent5: The supervirile warrior's bravery inspired all who fought alongside him.

meanings.definition: Exceeding the normal level of male strength or virility.
meanings.sent1: The supervirile lion easily defeated all challengers in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: His supervirile energy seemed endless as he worked tirelessly in the fields.
meanings.sent3: The supervirile horse galloped across the field with grace and power.
meanings.sent4: The supervirile storm raged on, showing no signs of weakening.
meanings.sent5: His supervirile determination led him to achieve great success in his endeavors.
